name: Eclipse Wolftrooper
description: A borisin soldier from the Eclipse Pack. Infamous for their gluttonous urge to devour the flesh of their enemies.

skills.name: Gnaw
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target. If this unit is under the <u>Moon Rage</u> state, attacks the target and restores this unit's HP.

skills.name: Lupine Maw
skills.description:
After a friendly unit launches an attack, applies 1 stack of "<u>Bloodlust</u>" to <u>friendly units who can enter the "Moon Rage" effect</u>. When "<u>Bloodlust</u>" reaches a certain stack, the friendly unit enters the "<u>Moon Rage</u>" state.
A "Moon Rage" countdown icon appears in the Action Order. When the countdown's turn begins, "<u>Moon Rage</u>" is dispelled across all friendly units.
